channel.title: Poor help environment
channel.description:
It's very disappointing to see that people in this community of moparscape are very selfish. I know this is probably in the wrong section but i need to say this. Look i know some people get sick and tired of the same old threads. People say google it so i do and all of them a windows. I ill show a image of what my files look like. Also i am a mac and the tutorial does not help. yet no one is willing to assist. Even the littlest (npc spawn/walk/health/drop). I'll go from first to last:
[img]http://puu.sh/2HNM5[/img]
Then i press hybridscape with all the details. *Remember moparscape.jar is what i run on, to get the client going.
[img]http://puu.sh/2HNCJ[/img]

item.title: Poor help environment
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:

You’ve made 3 topics on this now, come on, play the game son.

Read full topic

You need to restart your server if you’re trying to add NPC’s.

programming, irc, cars

item.title: Poor help environment
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Listen, gilbo, there’s thousands of users on this website. So you can expect that not everyone is going to help you the way you want, some people love to just jump on posts and be dicks.
But please, stop making topics on this and go to your current one that has 2 pages in responses.

AtomicInt_:

What exactly is your issue?

When He (I presume) edits a .cfg it doesn’t show the npc in the server when he runs.

Read full topic
